info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: XSS-Protection header in Explorer, Chrome, and Safari contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability if set to any value other than `0`.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: mobilic.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: no-cache; max-age=0 Content-Security-Policy: object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://client.crisp.chat https://api-adresse.data.gouv.fr https://*.ingest.sentry.io wss://client.relay.crisp.chat https://stats.data.gouv.fr; base-uri 'self'; default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://client.crisp.chat https://stats.data.gouv.fr; img-src 'self' data: https://client.crisp.chat https://stats.data.gouv.fr; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://client.crisp.chat; font-src 'self' https://client.crisp.chat; frame-src https://metabase.mobilic.beta.gouv.fr https://www.youtube.com https://www.slideshare.net https://cgu.mobilic.beta.gouv.fr Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 25 Sep 2022 06:50:54 GMT Etag: W/"632b681a-b46" Last-Modified: Wed, 21 Sep 2022 19:38:02 GMT Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: deny X-Request-Id: a87b7ffe-427e-4b87-83ac-b9fe6543e49d X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Mobilic

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 2977
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 2977
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 12569

; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ?all"

info.name: GraphQL Field Suggestion Information Disclosure
author: dolev farhi
info.description:
If introspection is disabled on your target, Field Suggestion can allow users to still earn information on the GraphQL schema.
By default, GraphQL backends have a feature for fields and operations suggestions.
If you try to query a field but you have made a typo, GraphQL will attempt to suggest fields that are similar to the initial attempt.

request:
POST /api/graphql HTTP/1.1
Host: mobilic.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 69
Content-Type: application/json
Accept-Encoding: gzip

{"query":"query {\n  __schema {\n directive\n }\n}","variables":null}
response:
HTTP/1.1 400 BAD REQUEST
Connection: close
Content-Length: 146
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Content-Type: application/json
Date: Sun, 25 Sep 2022 06:55:49 GMT
X-Request-Id: 8c1cfed8-2998-4f69-960c-8292432c1461
X-Request-Id: 8c1cfed8-2998-4f69-960c-8292432c1461

{"errors":[{"message":"Cannot query field \"directive\" on type \"__Schema\". Did you mean \"directives\"?","locations":[{"line":3,"column":2}]}]}
